item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 May 2025
item.description:
1. Send us Talk and Workshop Proposals for Fun OCaml 2025 in Warsaw, September 15+16
  2. Blog post: Using model-based testing on a Mirage filesystem implementation
  3. Volunteers to review the relocatable-OCaml work?
  4. Portable Lock Directories for Dune Package Management
  5. Other OCaml News
